name: gitstorm-panel
description: PhpStorm-style Git panel with branches, commits, and file changes

scripts.compile: npm run compile:ts && npm run copy:webview
scripts.copy:webview: mkdir -p out/webview/renderers out/webview/handlers out/webview/managers out/webview/operations out/webview/core out/templates out/styles && cp -r src/webview/* out/webview/ && cp src/templates/* out/templates/ && cp src/styles/* out/styles/
